entries.journal_entry_description: Valance Serth is missing.  His ship never landed in Moenia.  Find out what happened and save him.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: C-3TC told you that his master is missing.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Go to Moenia Starport and see if someone knows what happened to Valance Serth.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Find Selan Ellison and talk to her.  She knows someone who may help you.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Go to Tyrena on Corellia and speak with Amarent Loren, who should be in the spaceport.  One way or another, get him to tell you what happened to Valance Serth's ship.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Go to Talus and find the crashed ship.  It is near the Imperial Outpost.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Kill the Black Sun thugs that are threatening Valance Serth and then talk to him.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Valance Serth rewards you for saving his life.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Speak to Amarent Loren.  Functionaries like him are underpaid.  A well-placed bribe would loosen his tongue.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: You bribed Amarent Loren for his information.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Speak to Amarent Loren in Tyrena.  He can probably be bullied into giving you information.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: You intimidated Amarent Loren.  He gave you the information that you need, but I'm sure he reported you to his superiors.
